ghost_info.name: Spirit
ghost_info.data: None Smudge sticks are more effective, preventing a hunt for longer.

ghost_info.name: Wraith
ghost_info.data: Does not leave UV footprints after stepping in salt. Will become more active if it steps in salt.

ghost_info.name: Phantom
ghost_info.data: Looking at a Phantom will lower the player's sanity considerably. Taking a photo of the Phantom will cause it to briefly disappear.

ghost_info.name: Poltergeist
ghost_info.data: Capable of throwing multiple objects at once. Becomes powerless with no throwables nearby.

ghost_info.name: Banshee
ghost_info.data: Will target only one player at a time. Crucifix effectiveness is increased to 5m against one.

ghost_info.name: Jinn
ghost_info.data: Travels at faster speeds if its victim is far away. Cannot use its ability if the site's fuse box is off.

ghost_info.name: Mare
ghost_info.data: Has an increased chance to attack in the dark. Turning the lights on will reduce the chance of an attack.

ghost_info.name: Revenant
ghost_info.data: Can travel significantly faster if a player is spotted during a hunt. Moves very slowly when not chasing a player.

ghost_info.name: Shade
ghost_info.data: Being shy makes it more difficult to locate and obtain evidence. Less likely to hunt if multiple people are nearby.

ghost_info.name: Demon
ghost_info.data: Can initiate hunts more often. Using cursed possessions will lower sanity less.

ghost_info.name: Yurei
ghost_info.data: Has a stronger effect on sanity. Smudging the Yurei's ghost room will reduce how often it wanders.

ghost_info.name: Oni
ghost_info.data: Increased activity and ghost events. An Oni's increased activity makes themeasier to find.

ghost_info.name: Hantu
ghost_info.data: Lower temperatures allow the Hantu to move faster.  Warmer areas slow the Hantu's movement.

ghost_info.name: Yokai
ghost_info.data: Talking near the Yokai will anger it, increasing the chance to attack. Can only hear voices close to it during a hunt.

ghost_info.name: Goryo
ghost_info.data: Can only be seen interacting with D.O.T.S. through a camera when nobody is nearby. Tends to wander away less from its ghost room.

ghost_info.name: Myling
ghost_info.data: Has quieter footsteps during a hunt. Produces paranormal sounds more frequently.

ghost_info.name: Onryo
ghost_info.data: A flame extinguishing can cause an Onryo to attack. The presence of flames reduces the Onryo's ability to attack.

ghost_info.name: The Twins
ghost_info.data: Either Twin may start a hunt, though not at the same time. Will often interact with the environment at the same time.

ghost_info.name: Raiju
ghost_info.data: Moves faster near electrical devices. Disrupts electronic equipment from further away when it hunts.

ghost_info.name: Obake
ghost_info.data: May leave fingerprints that disappear quicker. Has a small chance of leaving six-fingered handprints.

ghost_info.name: The Mimic
ghost_info.data: Can mimic the abilities and traits of other ghosts. Will present Ghost Orbs as a secondary evidence.

map_info.name: Tanglewood Street House
map_info.data:
Haunted Mirror:
The Haunted Mirror spawns on the wall next to the Master Bedroom door in the Living Room.

Music Box:
The Music Box spawns on the shelf in the Nursery.

Ouija Board:
The Ouija Board spawns on the coffee table at the far end of the Basement.

Summoning Circle:
The Summoning Circle spawns near the stairs of the Basement.

Tarot Cards:
The Tarot Cards spawn on the end table by the window in the Living Room.

Voodoo Doll:
The Voodoo Doll spawns on the trash can in the Garage.

Music Box:

map_info.name: Grafton

Summoning Circle:
The Summoning Circle spawns in the Storage.

Ouija Board:

Haunted Mirror:

Tarot Cards:
The Tarot Cards spawn in the Dining Room on the dining table.

Voodoo Doll:
The Voodoo Doll spawns in the Nursery on the chest.

Ouija Board:

Summoning Circle:

Tarot Cards:

Voodoo Doll:

map_info.name: Brownstone High School
map_info.data: All cursed possessions spawn in the Lobby or in the immediate vicinity in the hallway.

map_info.name: Maple Lodge Campsite
map_info.data:
Ouija Board:
The Ouija Board spawns on the shelf in the Cleaning Closet.

Haunted Mirror:
The Haunted Mirror spawns in the Blue Tent.

Music Box:
The Music Box spawns outside the cabin on a metal table at the porch.

Voodoo Doll:
The Voodoo Doll spawns at the Campfire beside a wine bottle.

Tarot Cards:
The Tarot Cards spawn to the left side of the White Tent on a table.

Summoning Circle:
The Summoning Circle spawns in the Cabin Kitchen.

map_info.name: Prison

map_info.name: Asylum
